testcase.name: Amazon search field functionality check with two items
testcase.system-out: Given I am on Amazon homepage...............................................passed When I enter "Matcha Green Tea" and submit in the search field..............passed Then I verify items with "Amazon.com : Matcha Green Tea"....................passed
